languages.text: "Верные товарищи и угнанное эскортное судно с лоцманом-заложником. Оно доставит нас обратно в реальность, где, милостью Императора, мы подадим сигнал бедствия и будем спасены".
"Loyal comrades and a stolen escort ship with its pilot taken hostage. It will take us back to realspace, where, Emperor willing, we will send out a distress call and be saved."
languages.original_text: "Верные товарищи и угнанное эскортное судно с лоцманом-заложником. Оно доставит нас обратно в реальность, где, милостью Императора, мы подадим сигнал бедствия и будем спасены".

traits.locale_text: "Loyal comrades and a stolen escort ship with its pilot taken hostage. It will take us back to realspace, where, the Emperor willing, we will send out a distress call and be saved."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

traits.locale_text: "Loyal comrades and a stolen escort ship with its pilot taken hostage. It will take us back to realspace, where, Emperor willing, we will send out a distress call and be saved."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.text: “是我忠诚的同志们，还有一艘抢来的护卫舰。我们已经将护卫舰的飞行员劫为了人质。有了那艘护卫舰，我们就可以返回真实世界了。如果帝皇保佑的话，我们可以发送求救信号，等待救援。”
languages.original_text: "Loyal comrades and a stolen escort ship with its pilot taken hostage. It will take us back to realspace, where, Emperor willing, we will send out a distress call and be saved."

traits.locale_text: “是我忠诚的同志们，还有一艘抢来的护卫舰。我们已经将护卫舰的飞行员劫为了人质。有了那艘护卫舰，我们就可以返回真实世界了。如果帝皇保佑的话，我们可以发送求救信号，等待救援。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.text: 「忠実な同胞たちとパイロットを人質にとった状態で盗んだ護衛船です。皇帝のご意志次第ですが、うまくいけばリアルスペースに戻って救難信号を出して、脱出することができるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Loyal comrades and a stolen escort ship with its pilot taken hostage. It will take us back to realspace, where, Emperor willing, we will send out a distress call and be saved."

traits.locale_text: 「忠実な同胞たちとパイロットを人質にとった状態で盗んだ護衛船です。皇帝のご意志次第ですが、うまくいけばリアルスペースに戻って救難信号を出して、脱出することができるでしょう」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.text: «Camaradas leales y una nave escolta robada con un piloto rehén. Nos llevará de vuelta al espacio real, donde, Emperador mediante, podremos enviar una señal de socorro y ser rescatados».
languages.original_text: "Loyal comrades and a stolen escort ship with its pilot taken hostage. It will take us back to realspace, where, Emperor willing, we will send out a distress call and be saved."

traits.locale_text: «Camaradas leales y una nave escolta robada con un piloto rehén. Nos llevará de vuelta al espacio real, donde, Emperador mediante, podremos enviar una señal de socorro y ser rescatados».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.original_text: "Loyal comrades and a stolen escort ship with its pilot taken hostage. It will take us back to realspace, where, Emperor willing, we will send out a distress call and be saved."

languages.text: « Des camarades loyaux et un vaisseau d'escorte volé dont le pilote a été pris en otage. Il nous permettra de rejoindre l'espace réel, d'où nous pourrons envoyer un signal de détresse pour que l'on nous porte secours, si l'Empereur le veut. »
languages.original_text: "Loyal comrades and a stolen escort ship with its pilot taken hostage. It will take us back to realspace, where, Emperor willing, we will send out a distress call and be saved."

traits.locale_text: « Des camarades loyaux et un vaisseau d'escorte volé dont le pilote a été pris en otage. Il nous permettra de rejoindre l'espace réel, d'où nous pourrons envoyer un signal de détresse pour que l'on nous porte secours, si l'Empereur le veut. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.text: "Loyale Kameraden und ein gestohlenes Eskortschiff, dessen Pilot entführt wurde. Es wird uns in den Realraum zurückbringen, wo wir, so der Imperator es wünscht, ein Notsignal absetzen und gerettet werden."
languages.original_text: "Loyal comrades and a stolen escort ship with its pilot taken hostage. It will take us back to realspace, where, Emperor willing, we will send out a distress call and be saved."

traits.locale_text: "Loyale Kameraden und ein gestohlenes Eskortschiff, dessen Pilot entführt wurde. Es wird uns in den Realraum zurückbringen, wo wir, so der Imperator es wünscht, ein Notsignal absetzen und gerettet werden."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake

languages.text: "Sadık yoldaşlarımız ve pilotu esir alınmış, çalıntı bir refakatçi gemisi. Gemi, İmparator'un izniyle bizi yardım çağrısı yapıp kurtarılacağımız gerçekuzaya götürecek."
languages.original_text: "Loyal comrades and a stolen escort ship with its pilot taken hostage. It will take us back to realspace, where, Emperor willing, we will send out a distress call and be saved."

traits.locale_text: "Sadık yoldaşlarımız ve pilotu esir alınmış, çalıntı bir refakat gemisi. Bizi İmparator'un izniyle yardım çağrısı yapıp kurtarılacağımız gerçekuzaya geri götürecek."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_Fake
